Wouju.rscdel: Guillotine no longert forces you to clap

CheffieGithub.refactor: Refactored advclass to be a subtype of job and migrant_role to reference a job. report any role weirdness.

CheffieGithub.admin: Select Equipment renamed to Admin Dress, can now equip jobs and outfits are listed immediately.

wgtjunior743.admin: New Admin verb at the VV dropdown to coronate someone.

wgtjunior743.rscadd: Migrant Waves got their description at the menu.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed locks being able to unlock things :D

flleeppyy.server: Changes made to main config, `SERVERNAME`, `SERVERSUBTITLE` and `HOSTEDBY` namely.

grungussuss.rscadd: donators can take up to 3 cosmetic items with them into the game

grungussuss.rscdel: hollowkin and kobolds are no longer patreon exclusive

snowyseshi.rscadd: Added a pouch with mammons to the VL

snowyseshi.code_imp: Silver enchant now checks if its used by a weapon.

snowyseshi.balance: more chance to roll secondary antag if the storyteller rolls maniac or aspirant in highpop

Siro.bugfix: Replace unicode form of music notes to ascii for proper runechat handling.

Wouju.balance: Mantrap crafting recipe, the non-anvil one, makes a makeshift mantrap instead of an old one

Wouju.map: City garrison has more light sources

wgtjunior743.rscadd: Peeks, if you examine someone while you are sneaking there will be no visible message but the target may notice you looking at them based on your sneak skill vs theirs PER and abit of luck.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Minotaur sometimes attacking as a corpse.

wgtjunior743.rscadd: Minotaur axe variant now drops a double head greataxe upon death.

Magiy-Anne.rscadd: Added half-drow, drow, half-orcs, and tieflings to Rejected Royal Wretch

snowyseshi.code_imp: make restricted roles less strict for vampire and lich

SarmentiCampbell.balance: Youngling/Old Maniac/lich have now the same stats as their adult counterpart.

SarmentiCampbell.rscadd: Give Ability to remove Foreigner from Disgraced Knight, Rejected Royal

SarmentiCampbell.balance: Noble Scabbard now has silver Enchant.
Summon Rous, Conjure Puffer and Conjure Poison Bomb should no longer give you Arcane Skill

Arkatos.rscadd: God's chosen received an ability to view their tasks at any time via new button.
God's chosen tasks have new, varied rewards.

Ambrose997.balance: nerfed hedge mage's physical stats down to the same level as normal mages.

Bloo4420.bugfix: Innkeep and Steward peddler now hold keys that can actually be used

snowyseshi.bugfix:
fixed unplayable roles being playable

Wouju.bugfix: essence spells (used by the essence gauntlet) now require alchemy spell instead of arcyne, like they should've been

Wouju.rscadd: Forager Trait shows up and has a description now

MercadierY2K.rscadd: Adds Bardic Inspiration, usable by bards and related classes.

Wouju.rscadd: Leeches and worms are grindable in a mortar
examining any item that has a precursor will tell you what essence it gives (with enough alchemy skill of course)

Wouju.rscdel: Removed grind recipe for organs, grinding them gives their reagents instead

Wouju.rscadd: dwarven music box is craftable by artificers

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Adv classes who showed their title having all the same name.

wgtjunior743.rscadd: Vote Continue time scales of the amount of ppl who voted Continue or End round.
INITIAL_ROUND_TIMER now decides when the first vote of the round happens

Snack-Max.rscadd: Added four new hairstyles, Lakkari Bun, Lakkari Cut, Sand Crop and Dunes

DirectorNoot.rscadd: Added 'control undead' spell to necromancer's starting spells

DrSirKnight.rscadd: Added a way for nobles to contact admins for IC things by sending letters

DrSirKnight.admin: Added a way to send paper letters to people

TooFewSecrets.balance: Baothan clerics are better at crafting drugs and will not recklessly shout their goddess's name when handing out magic drugs.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Advclass and migrants get loadout items
Not every conjured item has infinite refreshes

Beryyseimith.rscadd: creating a noose now uses build delay instead of a skill-check.

Raptorian1.map: large sections of the map to shrink it down to a more manageable size.
Shrinked the lower floor of the inn.

Raptorian1.rscadd: Adds the sword display, paper and quills and another set of keys to the inn.

Raptorian1.rscdel: The bathrooms and bath from the inn.

Wouju.bugfix: fixed runtime error on examining items without a precursor

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Handpie uses the right mince type

DirectorNoot.rscadd: add control undead spell to lich

DirectorNoot.bugfix: Fixed that spell, previously did nothing

Dorodomki.rscadd:
Added more clothing rolls for pilgrims, the peasant pilgrim gets 6 tools on spawn

## Pre-Merge Checklist
- [x] You tested this on a local server.
- [x] This code did not runtime during testing.
- [x] You documented all of your changes.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: The game prioritizing your armor slot even if your shirt slot armor is better when taking damage
Triumph Buy \"Pick Any Class\" now works properly

Wouju.balance: You can pray to Psydon (and The Ten with their respective amulet) if you have a psycross/amulet in your active hand, neck or wrists

Wouju.bugfix: Noc amulet is now made of silver as it shouldve been

Wouju.rscadd: Inquisitors can purchase crossbows and lifeblood. Inquisitor favour list slightly tweaked (for example, chain gloves now come in one pair and not two)
Craftable wooden and metal psydon cross

Wouju.balance: 3 Adepts can now spawn roundstart, there can be a total of 2 adepts of the same advclass.
Slight changes to brutal zealot and inquisitor skills/stats/traits

Wouju.map: Major changes to the Old Church.

DrSirKnight.rscadd: Two new admin only rousmen and a admin only rous abomination

notably magickal frog.spellcheck: The magician in charge of writing the spell tree was found to be a Zizoite who was intentionally misinforming many novice wizards. They have been sacked, socked, and subsequently shot. Hail the Ten.
Some skill descriptions are more accurate too.

Wouju.rscadd: Adds the airgun, craftable by artificiers. Basically a steam musket. Requires average engineering to even be able to use it.

Wouju.map: added spare vault key located inside the vault, this is done for vanderlin, rosewood and wpp

Viviridia.rscadd: crafting recipes for new briar blessings
bush_dummy structure a part of the bush jaunt spell
agriopylon controllers, mob file, and its special ability

Viviridia.bugfix: fixed flower field overlays not being removed

Viviridia.image: adds spell icon for new spells [Falcon_disrupt], [Garden_Fae], [Bush_Jaunt]
adds falcon icon in effects.dmi and projectile.dmi
adds agriopylon icon with its act icon and overlays in summonable/32x32.dmi

Viviridia.code_imp: changed parts of the briar.dm code
changed some parts of the gnome farming code

7erracotta.rscadd: ton of new items and their crafting recipes

wgtjunior743.rscadd: Inquisitor and the Episcopal Inquisitor can contact the Holy Bishop of the Inquisition through a message bird.

wgtjunior743.admin: New Admin option at Manage Job to disable or enable jobs.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Dark Elves Zizo Descendant not having cursed elf blood.
Forest Guard now knows who is bandit or not from the roundstart.
Coronate now always gives the proper title.

Bloo4420.rscadd: Added a new tailor shop sign.

Bloo4420.map: Reconfigured the main road of Rosewood to flow better.
Many Rosewood shops have been reconfigured to be more accessible from the main road.
Fixed placement of Scoms, Meisters, and Hermes on Rosewood.
Added Meisters to the generic shops on Rosewood.
Changed the Rosewood theatre to be more like an ampitheatre.
Increased the size of the Rosewood clinic to be more visible.

Bloo4420.spellcheck: Fixed a few hermes directory entries.

snowyseshi.rscadd: Added new specials and tweak some special trait weight

Dorodomki.rscadd: Added more skills to the acolytes of ravox, malum, they get new tabards on them including the xylixian acolyte

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Bandits not appearing on the wanted poster.
Lich don't spawns with stats/traits and armor of their previous job anymore
Vampire Lord don't gets the stats or traits from their old job anymore.

Wouju.balance: Feldsher and Apothecary both have 1 slot, they can have two apprentices each

wgtjunior743.bugfix: You can ride moles by taming them with tame beast just like taming normally.
Court Mage got natural mana regen roundstart.

wgtjunior743.rscadd: An option to choose between toss blade and leather belt for the Faceless class.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Court Agent now appear as adventurer at the ready menu.

wgtjunior743.rscadd: A scaling system for adventurer roles based on the town roles pop
Satchel to Servant, Tapster, Orphanage Assistant and Ring Servant
Cook Recipe book to Servant, Tapster, Orphanage Assistant and Ring Servant.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Actor list now works as intended
